entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
